h3.style: color: rgb(76, 78, 78); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; text-align: center;

br.span:
Due to the circumstance with the coronavirus, Ewing Grade School will be closed
for the remainder of the 19-20 school year.

span.span:
Parents and Students-
Please see the following document for EGS's Remote Learning Plan. This plan explains expectations for teachers, students, parents and the district as we continue to learn during this pandemic time. All days, starting Tuesday, March 31, 2020, will be instructional days. Students are expected to work on academics and the district will be there to support learning. I thank each of you for your hard work and dedication to your child's education. Ewing teachers and staff are here to help, support and work as a team to ensure student success. Please feel free to reach out if you need any assistance.

br.span: Check your Class Dojo Page for Academic Information

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; color: red;

p.span: , the district will provide a “Grab and Go” lunch/snack meal for students. To order a meal for the day, please call the District office at 618-629-2181 from 8:00 am to 10:00 am. Lunches will be available for pick up or delivery from 11:00-1:00 Monday through Friday during the mandatory school closure timeframe.

The 24-hour SIH COVID-19 hotline at 844-988-7800 continues to take calls from individuals concerned about potential illness or exposure. Clinicians guide each caller through the screening criteria and advise them on next steps, with consultation from a provider, should the caller need additional evaluation and potential testing.

Assistance for Heat and Electric Bills.

p.span:
Mrs. Ing and the teachers will send out text messages periodically throughout the school year. Please sign up to receive these updates regarding early dismissal days, school closings, and events.
TO SET UP YOUR ACCOUNT
1. Text @ewingn1 to 81010
2. You will receive a text back asking your name. Text back your FIRST NAME AND LAST NAME.
This system is set up by parent names; therefore, a response with your first and last name will allow the school to identify each person that has set up the program.
Please do not respond to these text messages. They will not go through. If you have questions, please call the office (618-629-2181).​
Ewing Grade School Board of Education Email Address:
